definitions.definition: A yielding to natural impulses or inhibitions ; freedom from artificial constraint , with loss of appreciation of consequences. [Early 19th century.] ( Now especially in the phrase with abandon . )
examples: with gay abandon , with wild abandon

main_definition: A yielding to natural impulses or inhibitions ; freedom from artificial constraint , with loss of appreciation of consequences. [Early 19th century.] ( Now especially in the phrase with abandon . )
